data.comment: The match is underway at Urbano Caldeira.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos's Kaio Jorge is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, Santos have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Santos drives forward and Lucas Braga gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Santos.
In the minute 7, Santos have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jean for Goianiense GO who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 8, Jean for Goianiense GO is back on the field again.
Santos to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 10, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Santos's half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Santos.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 13, Important block from the Santos defence as Gustavo Ferrareis fires in a strike for Goianiense GO.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Santos.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 17, Play has been interrupted briefly in Santos to check on Gustavo Ferrareis, who is grimacing with pain.
Vagner Mancini (Goianiense GO) is making a first change, with Matheus Vargas replacing the possibly injured Gustavo Ferrareis.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 18, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Goianiense GO.
Santos are pushing forward but Jean Mota's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 23, Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Santos.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the home team a throw-in.
Goianiense GO are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 27, Goianiense GO's Chico gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Santos defender.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos's Felipe Jonatan misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Urbano Caldeira.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Free kick Santos.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 33, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 35, Jean Mota of Santos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos pushes forward through Kaio Jorge, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 36, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira waits before resuming play because Jean for Goianiense GO is still down.
Jean is back on the pitch.
In the minute 37, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Santos a goal kick.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 39, Santos are coming forward and Felipe Jonatan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 40, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In Santos Goianiense GO's Chico is caught offside.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Santos in the half of Goianiense GO.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 45, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Santos.
The first-half has come to a close in Santos.
The second-half is underway at Urbano Caldeira.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Santos's half.
In the minute 46, Lucas Lourenco is replacing Jean Mota for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 47, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Santos's half.
Goianiense GO's Willian Maranhao breaks free at Urbano Caldeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 48, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos push forward at Urbano Caldeira and Lucas Lourenco gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goianiense GO defence.
Throw-in for Santos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Urbano Caldeira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Chico (Goianiense GO) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 54, Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Santos.
Cuca (Santos) is making a second substitution, with Marcos Leonardo replacing Arthur Gomes.
Cuca is making the team's third substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Tailson replacing Lucas Braga.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 63, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Santos.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 65, Matheus Vargas of Goianiense GO gets in a strike, but is off target.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Santos a goal kick.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Kaio Jorge with Anderson Ceara. This is the fourth substitution made today by Cuca.
Goianiense GO make their second substitution with Hyuri replacing Ze Roberto.
Goal! Goianiense GO have got their heads in front thanks to a Chico strike.
In the minute 69, Santos to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Santos.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Santos.
Santos's Para has been booked in Santos and will miss the next match through suspension.
In the minute 73, In Santos, Marlon Freitas of Goianiense GO is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 74, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cuca (Santos) is making a fifth substitution, with Sandry Roberto replacing Para.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Goianiense GO throw-in in Santos's half.
Goianiense GO drive forward but Hyuri is judged offside.
In the minute 75, Free kick Santos.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Santos.
Marlon Freitas (Goianiense GO) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 80, Santos's Lucas Lourenco misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Sandry Roberto for Santos has been booked by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira and receives a first yellow card.
Santos will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Goianiense GO.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Santos.
In the minute 85, Goianiense GO's Willian Maranhao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Santos have a goal kick.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In the minute 87, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Natanael is replacing Chico for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Junior Brandao is replacing Janderson Santos de Souza for Goianiense GO at Urbano Caldeira.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 89, Diego Pituca for Santos has been booked by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Santos drives forward and Marcos Leonardo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goianiense GO needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
Santos are pushing forward but Lucas Lourenco's finish is wide of the goal.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Joao Victor (Goianiense GO) gets a yellow card.
